ruling: - [[Tornado Wall]] may be Set on the field if [[Umi]] is not on the field, but it cannot be activated. If targeted by [[Bait Doll]] when face-down and [[Umi]] is not on the field, it is destroyed.
- [[Tornado Wall]] may be activated when [[Maiden of the Aqua]] or [[A Legendary Ocean]] is face-up on the field.
